---
category: news
title: "Can robots fill the teacher shortage?"
excerpt: "With the United Nations predicting a global teacher shortage of around 70 million by 2030, so-called Socially Assistive Robots — which aim to interact with people in emotional or intellectually helpful ways — may be among the most viable ways to help these groups develop and catch up with peers."
